title: 【jkljkljs】自制ooc
author: jkljkljs
txt_content: summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:redstone_block,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:command_block,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~1 ~ ~ ~1 ~-7 ~ redstone_block},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:command_block,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~ ~2 ~ ~1 ~-6 ~ air},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:command_block,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:give @p diamond_sword 1 0 {Unbreakable:1,AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:100,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:sword}],display:{Name:"神剑"}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:command_block,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon Creeper ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:0}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:command_block,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:title @p subtitle {"text":"你拔出了神剑并学会了“拔刀斩”","color":"gold"}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:command_block,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:title @p title {"text":"拔出神剑","color":"gold"}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:command_block,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:tellraw @p {"text":"[拔刀斩]","color":"gold","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/kill @e[rm=1,r=10]"},"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":"对半径十格以内生物进行毁灭性打击"}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:command_block,Block:command_block,Time:1}}}}}}}}}

replies.author: 不死之躯
replies.txt_content: 没有图片           无图无真相
